bj.title: Beijing
bj.description: Beijing, the capital city of China, is a vibrant metropolis that seamlessly blends ancient history with modern development. As one of the most populous cities in the world, Beijing offers a rich cultural heritage, stunning architecture, and a dynamic urban lifestyle.

sh.title: Shanghai
sh.description: Shanghai, located on the eastern coast of China, is a bustling metropolis known for its modern skyline, rich history, and vibrant culture.
sh.forecast: Cloudy with a chance of rain

great_wall.title: Great Wall of China
great_wall.description: The Great Wall of China is one of the most famous structures in the world.

forbidden_city.title: Forbidden City
forbidden_city.description: The Forbidden City is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most iconic landmarks in Beijing.

oriental_pearl_tower.title: Oriental Pearl Tower
oriental_pearl_tower.description: The Oriental Pearl Tower is one of the most recognizable landmarks in Shanghai.

the_bund.title: The Bund
the_bund.description: The Bund is a famous waterfront area along the Huangpu River.
